content: Add new 'Binary Data Handling (Issue #297 Fix)' section to README.md with JavaScript and Golang examples
Create tests/binary-data-handling.test.js with comprehensive JavaScript binary data tests
Add additional test cases to existing cycletls/tests/integration/binary_data_test.go for issue #297 scenarios
Run tests to verify all examples and tests work correctly
Update changelog to address issue #297 being fixed in 2.0.2 release
